about_the_game:
Who said that the police can not drift ? Stand on the side of the law, show these presumptuous riders that they can not hide from the law. That even on the race track the guardians of law and order there. In this DLC you are waiting for 3 absolutely new cars:
  • Interceptor
  • Cobra
  • Judge
